name: CLP_ATTACHMENTS
description: This table stores claim-level attachment information.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ATTACHMENT_ROI_ID
columns.description: The attachment record ID containing claim-level attachment information.

columns.name: ATTACHMENT_CONTROL_NUM
columns.description: The attachment control number for the attachment.

columns.name: ATTACHMENT_GENERATED_YN
columns.description: The indicator that the attachment was generated.

columns.name: ATTACH_REMOVED_YN
columns.description: The indicator that the attachment was removed by a user from a workqueue.

columns.name: ATTACH_EDITED_YN
columns.description: The indicator that the attachment was edited by a user.
